insights: Range Rover has had a record-breaking year, with the brand positioning itself as the creator of modern luxury.
The company is celebrating the 50th anniversary of the Range Rover, highlighting its craftsmanship and refinements.
Range Rover is adopting a strategy of creating standalone personalities for its models, such as the Defender and Discovery, while maintaining the trust mark of the Land Rover brand.
The company's electric journey is focused on amplifying the DNA elements of the Range Rover brand, such as driving comfort, refinement, and unmistakable design.
Range Rover's electric vehicles will share a common architecture with internal combustion models, with the goal of making the electric version just as desirable as the traditional one.

The company is cautious about predicting when electric vehicles will become the majority, citing the evolving market, different geographical paces of electrification, and political environment as factors.
